title: Mama Brand Tom Yum Ramen Noodles and Roast Duck

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit a player. If you Crave their role, you learn of this and your Craving changes.
- If you visit a player and you do not Crave them, the evils learn of your identity and you cannot visit tommorow night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of the game, you Crave a certain random good role in game. You don't know who has this role.
